item.title: Chromatic Higher Semiadditivity by Height Induction
item.description: arXiv:2501.08092v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We give a new proof of the $\infty$-semiadditivity of $K(n)$-local spectra. The proof proceeds by induction on the height via algebraic K-theory, utilizing recent advances in chromatic homotopy theory and the redshift conjecture, instead of using the Ravenel-Wilson computation of the Morava K-theory of Eilenberg-MacLane spaces.
item.dc:creator: Shay Ben-Moshe
